did.abstract: An original draft of U.S. President Grover Cleveland's Thanksgiving proclamation delivered in 1883 while serving as governor of New York State.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single document.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Grover Cleveland speech, 1883, 1977.667, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: An original draft of 22nd and 24th U.S. President Grover Cleveland's Thanksgiving proclamation that he delivered in 1883 while serving as governor of New York State.
